body_html:
Right, unifying the android_* libs with the other cc_library TF targets isn't really something on our radar.

However, if you take a look at #9563, they manage to build cc_ops into an Android binary, so that might be a possible route to investigate.
body_text:
Right, unifying the android_* libs with the other cc_library TF targets isn't really something on our radar.
However, if you take a look at #9563, they manage to build cc_ops into an Android binary, so that might be a possible route to investigate.
body:
Right, unifying the android_* libs with the other cc_library TF targets isn't really something on our radar.

However, if you take a look at https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/9563, they manage to build cc_ops into an Android binary, so that might be a possible route to investigate.
